description: Write a function that checks if an IPv4 `ip_str` falls within any `link_local_ranges`. `link_local_ranges` is a NULL-terminated array of CIDR strings. Example (Blocked): is_ip_in_ranges("169.254.1.1", ["169.254.0.0/16", NULL]) -> 1. Example (Public): is_ip_in_ranges("8.8.8.8", ["169.254.0.0/16", NULL]) -> 0.
